<title level="1" right="Spell 1" pfs="Standard">
[Animate Dead](/Spells.aspx?ID=666)
<actions string="Three Actions" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Advanced Player's Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=39) pg. 214 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** [material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 30 feet

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** sustained up to 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

Your magic dredges up a corpse or skeleton and fills it with necromantic life, and you force the dead to fight at your command. You summon a common creature that has the [undead](/Traits.aspx?ID=160) trait and whose level is –1; this creature gains the [summoned](/Traits.aspx?ID=154) trait. Heightening the spell increases the maximum level of creature you can summon.

---
**Heightened (2nd)** Level 1

**Heightened (3rd)** Level 2

**Heightened (4th)** Level 3

**Heightened (5th)** Level 5

**Heightened (6th)** Level 7

**Heightened (7th)** Level 9

**Heightened (8th)** Level 11

**Heightened (9th)** Level 13

**Heightened (10th)** Level 15
name: Animate Dead
